name: Space Shooter (Unity Tutorial)
description:
You are a Space who must shoot the other Spaces for great Scores, AND GREAT JUSTICE!

wasd and arrow movement

fire with Ctrl or Mouse1

restart with R when prompted

This is based off  a Unity tutorial's finished product (with minor adjustments, as you do) and I feel the need to fill out my itch.io portfolio... I'm gonna learn how to use more Unity.
